product_name: SmartWool PhD Snowboard Light Cushion Socks - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A great-fitting technical snowboard sock, the SmartWool PhD Snowboard Light Socks are designed for women and feature extra wool content in the heel and forefoot area for durability and comfort.
